archimate:DataObject.name: PolicyAppliesToDetails
archimate:DataObject.documentation: This is an association class that explicitly defines which ManagedEntities in a PolicyDomain this Policy information applies to.This association defines the set of Policies that reside in a particular PolicyDomain. This single association links Policy and its subclasses to PolicyDomain. PolicyApplications are related to a PolicyDomain throught the ScopesPolicyApplication aggregation. Thus; different subclasses of PolicyApplication; such as PolicyServer; PDP; PEP; and PXP; can be placed in the same PolicyDomain as different Policies.
